description: Create your own AI Influencer. Just describe your ideal influencer, click create, and you are ready to take virtual pictures of your AI influencer!
title: InfluencerFarm - Generate AI Influencers
keywords: AI Influencers, AI Generated, Influencer, Create, Make, Build
introduction: InfluencerFarm is a platform that allows users to create, fine-tune, and interact with AI-generated virtual influencers. Users can generate AI influencers, take them on virtual photoshoots, and share the resulting images on social media.
targetPeople: Social media enthusiasts, marketers, and content creators

faqs.question: How do I create an AI influencer?
faqs.answer: Go to the dashboard and click on the 'Add a new influencer' button to access the creation page.

faqs.question: How do I fine-tune my AI influencer?
faqs.answer: Click on the 'Fine tune' button on the creation page, personalize your influencer, and click the create influencer button. The process takes about 3 minutes.

faqs.question: How do I take a photo with my AI influencer?
faqs.answer: Go to the 'Take picture' page, choose a location, and describe a scene to generate a picture with your AI influencer.

faqs.question: How can I view all the photos of my AI influencer?
faqs.answer: Click on the 'Timeline' button on the AI influencer profile to view all the pictures featuring your AI influencer.

faqs.question: How can I share the pictures of my AI influencer?
faqs.answer: You can download the picture or share it directly on social media.
